item.description:
Join us again on Saturday May 17th from 3:30-5:00 at Off The Leash for some fun small doggie play!

Our indoor facility is fully matted for cleanliness and comfort. We have a fenced in, matted outdoor area for play and bathroom needs.

We look forward to meeting new friends!

Note: The time for this meet-up has changed to 3:30 due to the training class schedule at Off The Leash.

Important: Please keep in mind that the health of our small dog friends is one of our top priorities. When dogs play together, it is very important that each dog is current on all of their vaccinations. These vaccinations include: DHLPP, Bordatella (canine cough) and Rabies. Please ensure that your dog is current on all vaccinations before coming to the meet ups!

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs May Meeting
